title: USC freshman center Evan Mobley declares for 2021 NBA draft
body: 7-footer          -- the No. 2 prospect in          -- has declared for the 2021 NBA draft via an NFT."LEAGUE BOUND!" he said in a post on Twitter. "I've dreamed about turning pro since I was a kid. Come along for the journey."Mobley was named the Pac-12 Player of the Year this past season while averaging 16.4 points and 8.7 rebounds.Mobley led the Trojans to the NCAA tournament's Elite Eight, where they lost to eventual national runner-up Gonzaga.
